[Version 1.0.0]
[Open Status to gain Max EXP (on)]
04000000 009B03FC B900B260
04000000 009B0400 0B140008
[Open Status to gain Max EXP (off)]
04000000 009B03FC B940B275
04000000 009B0400 2A0003F4

[Open Skill Window to Gain 999 Skill points (on)]
04000000 015975A4 52807CE9
04000000 015975A8 B900B509
04000000 015975AC B900B91F
04000000 015975B0 B9000049
04000000 015975B4 D65F03C0
[Open Skill Window to Gain 999 Skill points (off)]
04000000 015975A4 2956A109
04000000 015975A8 4B080128
04000000 015975AC B9000048
04000000 015975B0 D65F03C0
04000000 015975B4 00000000

[Gold never decreases]
04000000 009F59C4 D503201F
[Gold increases instead of decrease]
04000000 009F59C4 2B010108
[Gold changes like normal]
04000000 009F59C4 6B010108

[Obtain 1x Gold]
04000000 009F58C0 0B010101
[Obtain 2x Gold]
04000000 009F58C0 0B010501
[Obtain 4x Gold]
04000000 009F58C0 0B010901
[Obtain 8x Gold]
04000000 009F58C0 0B010D01
[Obtain 16x Gold]
04000000 009F58C0 0B011101
[Obtain 32x Gold]
04000000 009F58C0 0B011501
[Obtain a lot of Gold]
04000000 009F58C0 0B015901
